DOC.brief_title: Effects Bile Acids GLP-1 Secretion After Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass
DOC.criteria: Uncomplicated RYGB perform minimum 3 month prior study . Fasting plasma glucose < 7.0mM , HbA1c < 48mmol/mol 3 month RYGB . Fasting plasma glucose > 7.0mM , HbA1c > 48mmol/mol 3 month RYGB . Dysregulated hypothyroidism , use antithyroid treatment . Late diabetic complication retinopathy , renal insufficiency , neuropathy previous pancreatitis . Complications RYGB : Documented reactive hypoglycaemia , severe dumping ( vomit , diarrhea , severe abdominal pain food intake ) .
